theWeaponMaster:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theWeaponMaster:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theWeaponMaster:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

theWeaponMaster:ArsenalRelic.NAME: The Arsenal
theWeaponMaster:ArsenalRelic.FLAVOR: I might just have the right tool for the job.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-Click: #yWeapon #ySwap. NL Gain 2 #yVicious every time you use an #yAttack card. NL Current Weapon:

theWeaponMaster:RevolverRelic.NAME: The Revolver
DESCRIPTIONS: Expend one shot every time you use an #yAmmunition card. #yReload when the counter hits 0, refund one Energy when reloading with an Ammunition card.

theWeaponMaster:HeavyDrum.NAME: Heavy Drum
DESCRIPTIONS: As long as you own this relic, you reload after 5 shots and deal #B1 extra damage with Ammunition cards.

theWeaponMaster:SplinteringSteelRelic.NAME: Splintering Steel
theWeaponMaster:SplinteringSteelRelic.FLAVOR: The best offense is a layer of sharp steel shards.

theWeaponMaster:ManaWhetstoneRelic.NAME: Mana Whetstone
theWeaponMaster:ManaWhetstoneRelic.FLAVOR: To keep those ethereal edges extra sharp.

theWeaponMaster:GhoulskinSheathRelic.NAME: Ghoulskin Sheath
theWeaponMaster:GhoulskinSheathRelic.FLAVOR: Makes transporting the cleaver much more safe.

theWeaponMaster:HellhoundOilRelic.NAME: Hellhound Oil(tm)
theWeaponMaster:HellhoundOilRelic.FLAVOR: The very best in keeping your favorite edge sharp for only 24.99 for a can!

theWeaponMaster:ShockwaveModulatorRelic.NAME: Shockwave Modulator
theWeaponMaster:ShockwaveModulatorRelic.FLAVOR: What do you mean "this has been underclocked all along"?
